import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react'; import "../styles/Home.css"; import flightContent from "../context/FlightContext"; const Destination = () => { const content = useContext(flightContent) const {departure, setDeparture, setArrival, arrival, filter, filterDest, onChangeDeparture, onChangeArrival} = content return (
{/* { departure === '' ? :
From
} */}
From
{ filter.map((element)=> { return
{ e.preventDefault() setDeparture(element.id) filterDest('')}} >
{element.city}
{element.id}
{element.country}
{element.name}
}) }
To
{ filter.map((element)=> { return
{ e.preventDefault() setArrival(element.city) filterDest('')}} >
{element.city}
{element.id}
{element.country}
{element.name}
}) }
) } export default Destination
